channel.title: Basic on Lamin Sanneh
channel.description: Recent content in Basic on Lamin Sanneh

item.title: Expressions
item.description: Expressions <div id="app"> <p>I have a {{ product }}</p> <p>{{ product + 's' }}</p> <p>{{ isWorking ? 'YES' : 'NO' }}</p> <p>{{ product.getSalePrice() }}</p> </div>

item.title: Binding
item.description: Binding Fullhand <a v-bind:href="url">...</a> Shorthand <a :href="url">...</a> Binding2 True or false will add or remove attribute: <button :disabled="isButtonDisabled”>... If isActive is truthy, the class ‘active’ will appear: <div :class="{ active: isActive }">... Style color set to value of activeColor: <div :style="{ color: activeColor }">
